name: mcp-builder
title: MCP构建器
description: 快速构建MCP(Model Context Protocol)服务器，集成外部API和工具到Kimi CLI
description_en: Quickly build MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers to integrate external APIs and tools into Kimi CLI
author: godlike-kimi-skills

action.description: 操作类型: init(初始化), add-tool(添加工具), build(构建), validate(验证)
action.description_en: Action type: init, add-tool, build, validate

transport.description: 传输方式: stdio(标准输入输出) 或 sse(服务器发送事件)

tools.description: 工具定义列表，每个工具包含name, description, parameters
tools.description_en: List of tool definitions with name, description, and parameters

templates.description: 预设模板: weather(天气), search(搜索), calculator(计算器), file(文件操作)
templates.description_en: Preset templates: weather, search, calculator, file

force.description: 强制覆盖已存在的文件

examples.description: 初始化一个stdio模式的MCP服务器
examples.description_en: Initialize a stdio mode MCP server

examples.description: 初始化带天气工具的SSE服务器
examples.command: python main.py init --name weather-server --transport sse --port 8080 --templates weather
examples.description_en: Initialize an SSE server with weather tool
